title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Chart of the Day for Oct. 17
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Chart of the Day for Oct. 17
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUESTS:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his Chart of the Day "Can't `buy the dip' in the S&P 500 if there's no dip." Email Dave at DWilson@bloomberg.net to sign up for the Chart.\u0010\u0010Justin Sink\u0010White House Reporter\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing President Trump seeking to unite GOP over tax plan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
